```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

1. Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

2. load and wrangle data
```{r}
alldiptera<- read_csv("alldip2232019.csv")


#make df way less obnoxious
dipsimple <-alldiptera %>%
  select(
    order, family, scientificName, year, eventDate, samplingProtocol, country, stateProvince, county, municipality, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, recordedBy)


#show just NCOS since no labelproject column
dipncos <- dipsimple %>%
  filter(recordedBy == "UCSB Arthropod Survey")
```

3. data exploration
```{r}
ncosdipbar <- dipncos %>% filter(family != "NA")

ggplot(ncosdipbar) + geom_bar(aes(x = family))
```
